tool_description: To subscribe please contact us, only private plans are available, testing is free. You could contact us through https://linktr.ee/cloverapis (we reply within hours).
name: Taobao/Tmall (淘宝) Data Service
title: Taobao/Tmall (淘宝) Data Service

api_list.name: Item Video Info
api_list.description: Retrieves Item Video info based on the video Id.

api_list.name: Item Description
Get Latest Seller Items
api_list.description: Retrieves the last 100 seller items, page is fixed so their is no pagination.

api_list.name: Seller Info
api_list.description: Retrieves seller info given the seller Id.

api_list.name: Search Suggestions
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of keyword suggestions based on a query. This is used for autocomplete scenarios.

api_list.name: Search Items By Image Url
api_list.description: Searches for items based on an Image Url. This uses the Taobao image search functionality, so the data is new and directly from Taobao. This endpoint has a fixed 60 items. Their is no page pagination(the results are so accurate that 60 items are more than enough). Note that the image Url can be form any website and not necessarily an image hosted on Taobao servers.

required_parameters.name: imageUrl
required_parameters.description: The Url of the image to be searched for. We downscale all files above 50kB in size, so down-scaling the images before sending them is a better approach.

optional_parameters.name: region
optional_parameters.description:
The region box that will be focused on in the search. Provide it as follows: `x1,x2,y1,y2`. The API already returns a suggested list of regions. Those suggested regions are accurate and could be beneficial. You could check this image for reference on how region boxes are used:
![](https://i.ibb.co/PYGscpb/image.png)

api_list.name: Item Details
api_list.description: Gets Taobao Item Details from the official app.
